summary: 2016 CHEVROLET SILVERADO.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO TRAILER TOWING MIRRORS VISIBILITY ISSUES.  *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE MIRRORS SIT 6 TO 8 INCHES TOO HIGH, BLOCKING THE VIEW OF CRITICAL AREAS TO THE SIDES AND AHEAD ON THE LEFT SIDE. THE MIRRORS ALSO INTERFERE WITH THE VIEW OF ONCOMING TRAFFIC AT INTERSECTIONS AND PEDESTRIANS. THE THICK POSTS BETWEEN THE WINDSHIELD AND THE DOORS EXACERBATE THE PROBLEM. UPDATED 08/28/2017*JS
